objects.name: Analytic 0154
objects.description: Detection of unexpected additions or modifications to system-wide certificate stores or execution of commands adding certificates to trusted stores.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: auditd:SYSCALL
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: open, write: File modifications under /etc/ssl/certs, /usr/local/share/ca-certificates, or /etc/pki/ca-trust/source/anchors

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: auditd:EXECVE
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: execve: Execution of update-ca-certificates or trust anchor modification commands

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: Paths monitored for certificate modifications; can be tuned depending on Linux distribution.
Expected user accounts with privileges to install root certificates; anomalies outside this context are suspicious.
